trans-unit.source: @@new-user form will now always show the password fields, regardless of the site settings. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: @@new-user form will now always show the password fields, regardless of the site settings. [esteele]

trans-unit.source: A package for all things users and groups related (specific to plone)
trans-unit.target: 一个与用户和组相关的所有事物的包(具体到plone)

trans-unit.source: Add MANIFEST.in [WouterVH]
trans-unit.target: Add MANIFEST.in [WouterVH]

trans-unit.source: Add Portal Member
trans-unit.target: 添加门户会员

trans-unit.source: Add support for Python 3. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: 增加对Python 3的支持。[pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Add support for Python 3.8 [pbauer] (#82)
trans-unit.target: 增加对Python 3.8的支持 [pbauer](#82)

trans-unit.source: Added configlet forms that inherit from personal preferences and personal information. These forms are used when editing user prefs from ‘User and groups’ in site setup. [kcleong]
trans-unit.target: Added configlet forms that inherit from personal preferences and personal information. These forms are used when editing user prefs from ‘User and groups’ in site setup. [kcleong]

trans-unit.source: Added missing i18n:domain plone in user information template which prevented some translations from showing up. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10744 [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 增加了用户信息模板中缺失的i18n:domain plone,导致一些翻译无法显示。修复了http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10744 [maurits]

trans-unit.source: Added ttw editable schema for personal information. [ianderso, ljb, stevem]
trans-unit.target: 为个人信息增加了tw可编辑模式。[ianderso,ljb,stevem]

trans-unit.source: Added upgrade step to move past Plone to user editable member schema. [ianderso]
trans-unit.target: 增加了升级步骤,将Plone移至用户可编辑的成员模式。[ianderso]

trans-unit.source: Added user timezone selection to user preferences and a dependency on plone.app.event for vocabulary for user timezone selection. [seanupton]
trans-unit.target: 在用户偏好设置中添加了用户时区选择,并为用户时区选择的词汇添加了对plone.app.event的依赖。[seanupton]

trans-unit.source: Adjust navigation markup for Plone 5. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 调整Plone 5的导航标记。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Allow admins to register a user at all times, also without valid mailhost settings. This means that in a fresh Plone site you can create user accounts immediately without having to edit any settings. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 允许管理员在任何时候都可以注册一个用户,也不需要有效的mailhost设置。这意味着在一个全新的Plone网站中,你可以立即创建用户账户,而无需编辑任何设置。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Avoid deprecation warnings under Zope 2.13. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 避免Zope 2.13下的废弃警告。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Avoid direct zope.app.form dependency. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 避免直接依赖zope.app.form。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Be consistent in using INavigationRoot. (Backport from 1.1.4) [do3cc]
trans-unit.target: 在使用INavigationRoot时要保持一致。(从1.1.4回传)[do3cc]

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes:
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。

trans-unit.source: Cache schemas in volatile attributes on portal. [gotcha]
trans-unit.target: 缓存门户上volatile属性中的模式。[疑难杂症]

trans-unit.source: Change registration form name @@join_form to @@register. Change class names accordingly. Added an “@@new-user” form to be used from the control panel. “Add to group” functionality now lives there. We can now get rid of the horrid came_from flags that we’ve been passing around. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: Change registration form name @@join_form to @@register. Change class names accordingly. Added an “@@new-user” form to be used from the control panel. “Add to group” functionality now lives there. We can now get rid of the horrid came_from flags that we’ve been passing around. [esteele]

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Check for permission when editing other users’ profiles. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/11842 and http://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/CVE-2011-1950 [fRiSi, davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Check for permission when editing other users’ profiles. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/11842 and http://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/CVE-2011-1950 [fRiSi, davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Check the permission for the Object tab on the AccountPanelForm as configured in ZCML. This allows to revoke access to individual forms by changing the permissions via ZCML overrides. [thet]
trans-unit.target: 检查在ZCML中配置的AccountPanelForm的对象选项卡的权限。这允许通过ZCML覆盖改变权限来撤销对单个表单的访问。[thet]

trans-unit.source: Code cleanup. [thet]
trans-unit.target: 代码清理。[thet]

trans-unit.source: Defining the user schema in a GenericSetup profile
trans-unit.target: 在GenericSetup配置文件中定义用户模式。

trans-unit.source: Depend on
trans-unit.target: 取决于

trans-unit.source: Disable toolbar buttons on personal preferences [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: 在个人偏好设置中禁用工具栏按钮[vangheem]。

trans-unit.source: Display a message and prevent the user from registering if there is no defined mailhost and users are not allowed to select their own passwords. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: 如果没有定义的mailhost,且用户不允许选择自己的密码,则显示一条消息并阻止用户注册。[esteele]

trans-unit.source: Display groups by title (id) in @@new-user. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: 在@@new-user中按标题(id)显示组。[esteele]

trans-unit.source: Do not force “In User Profile” when importing a schema from a GS profile. [ebrehault]
trans-unit.target: Do not force “In User Profile” when importing a schema from a GS profile. [ebrehault]

trans-unit.source: Doctest markup generalization [petschki] (#92)
trans-unit.target: Doctest标记泛化 [petschki](#92)

trans-unit.source: Don’t allow non-Managers to add new users to groups that grant the Manager role. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Don’t allow non-Managers to add new users to groups that grant the Manager role. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Don’t assume that fields in the user schema will be saved in property sheets when a new user registers. Instead, adapt the navigation root to the user schema to get the same adapter as is used on the Personal Information form, and use it to save the values from the registration form. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Don’t assume that fields in the user schema will be saved in property sheets when a new user registers. Instead, adapt the navigation root to the user schema to get the same adapter as is used on the Personal Information form, and use it to save the values from the registration form. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Don’t depend on ZODB version directly. Rely on Zope dependency [tomgross]
trans-unit.target: Don’t depend on ZODB version directly. Rely on Zope dependency [tomgross]

trans-unit.source: Don’t show unescaped user id in user-information form. This applies PloneHotfix20160830. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: Don’t show unescaped user id in user-information form. This applies PloneHotfix20160830. [maurits]

trans-unit.source: Don’t use a custom widget just to set the description of the fullname field, which should be set on the field itself. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Don’t use a custom widget just to set the description of the fullname field, which should be set on the field itself. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Ensure links on user preference panes adhere to navigation root. Fixes https://dev.plone.org/ticket/11909. [davidjb]
trans-unit.target: Ensure links on user preference panes adhere to navigation root. Fixes https://dev.plone.org/ticket/11909. [davidjb]

trans-unit.source: Ensured partial searching utility for users in ‘Search for users’ page Fixes https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFPlone/issues/1499 [kkhan]
trans-unit.target: Ensured partial searching utility for users in ‘Search for users’ page Fixes https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFPlone/issues/1499 [kkhan]

trans-unit.source: Error happening during user add notification is logged. (#85)
trans-unit.target: 用户添加通知时发生的错误被记录下来。(#85)

trans-unit.source: Explicitly set the mail_me field as not required. [jcbrand]
trans-unit.target: 明确设置mail_me字段为非必填字段。[jcbrand]

trans-unit.source: Fix @@user-information to correctly get/set and delete the portrait for the given userid. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10731. [mr_savage]
trans-unit.target: Fix @@user-information to correctly get/set and delete the portrait for the given userid. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10731. [mr_savage]

trans-unit.source: Fix browser test to use name of user/password field instead of label. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: 修正浏览器测试使用用户/密码的名称而不是标签。[jensens]

trans-unit.source: Fix bug when registering a user by adding a schema-setter to UserDataPanelAdapter. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: 修正通过在UserDataPanelAdapter中添加模式设定器来注册用户时的错误。[pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Fix default value for label_msgid. (#88) [erral]
trans-unit.target: 修正label_msgid的默认值。(#88)[错误]

trans-unit.source: Fix email as login validation in the personalize form (UserDataPanel). This is for the case when email is used as login. It checked that a changed email address was valid as user id. But the user id is never changed here, only the login name. We only need to check if this address is not used by another user. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 修正个性化表单(UserDataPanel)中电子邮件作为登录验证的问题。这是针对使用电子邮件作为登录的情况。它检查了更改后的电子邮件地址作为用户ID是否有效。但是这里的用户id从来没有改变过,只有登录名。我们只需要检查这个地址是否没有被其他用户使用。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Fix for: Plone Administrator unable to edit User Data when email is used as login. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/12297 [vmaksymiv, myroslav]
trans-unit.target: Fix for: Plone Administrator unable to edit User Data when email is used as login. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/12297 [vmaksymiv, myroslav]

trans-unit.source: Fix issue where an e-mail was sent on registration even when told not to. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10330 [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Fix issue where an e-mail was sent on registration even when told not to. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10330 [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix many_groups usage in AddUserForm [tmassman] (#83)
trans-unit.target: 修正AddUserForm中many_groups的用法 [tmassman](#83)

trans-unit.source: Fix missing i18n:translate calls [erral] (#80)
trans-unit.target: 修正缺失的i18n:translate调用 [erral](#80)

trans-unit.source: Fix packaging error. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: 修复包装错误。[esteele]

trans-unit.source: Fix some more duplicate id’s, including some done through TAL that had nothing dynamic and so nee not be tal:attributes. [rossp]
trans-unit.target: Fix some more duplicate id’s, including some done through TAL that had nothing dynamic and so nee not be tal:attributes. [rossp]

trans-unit.source: Fix tests to avoid using testbrowser internals. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 修正测试以避免使用testbrowser内部结构。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix to not break if passwords contain non-ASCII characters. This closes https://dev.plone.org/ticket/13114 [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Fix to not break if passwords contain non-ASCII characters. This closes https://dev.plone.org/ticket/13114 [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fixed “Add new user” form when there are too many groups. Fixes https://github.com/plone/plone.app.users/issues/33 [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: Fixed “Add new user” form when there are too many groups. Fixes https://github.com/plone/plone.app.users/issues/33 [avoinea]

trans-unit.source: Fixed @@change-password to accept current password containing non-ascii chars [sgeulette]
trans-unit.target: 修正了 @@change-password 接受包含非ascii字符的当前密码 [sgeulette]。

trans-unit.source: Fixed @@change-password to accept new password containing non-ascii chars [sgeulette]
trans-unit.target: 修正了 @@change-password 接受包含非ascii字符的新密码 [sgeulette]。

trans-unit.source: Fixed @@register by removing unnecessary fill-slot outside of a fill-macro. [spliter]
trans-unit.target: 修正了@@register,删除了 fill-macro 外的不必要的 fill-slot。[分割器]

trans-unit.source: Fixed KeyError email on personal preferences form. This could happen when email is used as login name. Fixes https://github.com/plone/plone.app.users/issues/56 and https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFPlone/issues/1146 [maurits]
trans-unit.target: Fixed KeyError email on personal preferences form. This could happen when email is used as login name. Fixes https://github.com/plone/plone.app.users/issues/56 and https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFPlone/issues/1146 [maurits]

trans-unit.source: Fixed bad use of i18n markup in joinform.py. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9773 [vincentfretin]
trans-unit.target: Fixed bad use of i18n markup in joinform.py. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9773 [vincentfretin]

trans-unit.source: Fixed critical error on add user page when some groups have a non-ascii character in their title. Sort groups on their title normalized. Token and value in terms in the groups vocabulary were switched. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/11316 [thomasdesvenain, vincentfretin, davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Fixed critical error on add user page when some groups have a non-ascii character in their title. Sort groups on their title normalized. Token and value in terms in the groups vocabulary were switched. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/11316 [thomasdesvenain, vincentfretin, davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fixed error when editing your personal information when using the email address as login. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10363 [Maurits]
trans-unit.target: Fixed error when editing your personal information when using the email address as login. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10363 [Maurits]

trans-unit.target: 修正了 help_biography 消息。[vincentfretin]

trans-unit.source: Fixed i18n of new_password field in change-password view. [vincentfretin]
trans-unit.target: 修正了更改密码视图中new_password字段的i18n。[vincentfretin]

trans-unit.source: Fixed package dependency declarations and use getSite from zope.site. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 修正了包的依赖性声明,并使用zope.site的getSite。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed test of the default user portrait, which changed from defaultUser.gif to defaultUser.png in Products.PlonePAS 4.0.5. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 修正了Products.PlonePAS 4.0.5中默认用户画像由defaultUser.gif变为defaultUser.png的测试。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Fixed tests to account for new layout of users overview pages. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: 修正了测试,以考虑到用户概览页的新布局。[esteele]

trans-unit.source: Fixes:
trans-unit.target: 修复。
For “User/Groups Settings” configlet highlighted “Member registration” tab instead of the wrong “Settings” [spliter]
Gave upgrade step destination 1. With the previous destination ‘*’ the upgrade step was always offered. [vanrees]

trans-unit.source: Give a 404 when the user-information form is called with a not existing userid. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 当调用用户信息表单时,如果用户ID不存在,则给出一个404。[maurits]

trans-unit.target: Handle encoded strings returned by PlonePAS. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10447 [esteele]

trans-unit.source: Have a soft dependency on plone.app.event and include the timezone field only then in the schema, if plone.app.event is available. [thet]
trans-unit.target: 对plone.app.event进行软依赖,如果plone.app.event可用,则只在模式中包含时区字段。[thet]

trans-unit.source: Make sure that users with the Site Administrator role can add new users to groups. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/11888 [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Make sure that users with the Site Administrator role can add new users to groups. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/11888 [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Make the password field optional for the admin when instead an email can be sent. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 将密码字段设为管理员的可选项,而不是可以发送电子邮件。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Manipulating the user schema through the web
trans-unit.target: 通过网络操纵用户模式。

trans-unit.source: Migrate plone.app.users to use z3c.form instead of zope.formlib. [lentinj, vipod, thet]
trans-unit.target: 迁移plone.app.user使用z3c.form而不是zope.formlib。[lentinj,vipod,thet]

trans-unit.source: Minor packaging updates. (#1)
trans-unit.target: 小幅更新包装。(#1)

trans-unit.source: More explicit ZCML package includes. At least, the inclusion of plone.formwidget.namedfile fixes a problem in Dexterity-less setups, where the @@personal-information form couldn’t be rendered because NamedBlobImage didn’t provide IFromUnicode. [thet]
trans-unit.target: More explicit ZCML package includes. At least, the inclusion of plone.formwidget.namedfile fixes a problem in Dexterity-less setups, where the @@personal-information form couldn’t be rendered because NamedBlobImage didn’t provide IFromUnicode. [thet]

trans-unit.source: Move forgotten ‘registered’ template from Products.CMFPlone skins to here, were it belongs to. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Move forgotten ‘registered’ template from Products.CMFPlone skins to here, were it belongs to. [jensens]

trans-unit.source: New features:
trans-unit.target: 新特点:

trans-unit.source: Note: the
trans-unit.target: 注:

trans-unit.source: On the anonymous registration form, do not offer to send an email with a link to reset your password if the password fields are right there on the form already; we were never actually sending emails with the plain password itself anyway. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 在匿名注册表格上,如果密码字段已经在表格上了,就不要提供发送带有重设密码链接的电子邮件;反正我们从来没有真正发送过带有普通密码本身的电子邮件。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Once a new field is added, we can access its settings, and more specifically, we can choose where the field must be shown (in the registration form, in the user profile form, or in both).
trans-unit.target: 一旦添加了一个新的字段,我们就可以访问它的设置,更具体地说,我们可以选择该字段必须显示的位置(在注册表格中,在用户资料表格中,或在两者中)。

trans-unit.target: 覆盖/扩展默认模式

trans-unit.source: Remove dependency on

trans-unit.target: Remove unneeded arrow next to Site Setup button in “Edit Member Form Fields” controlpanel. [vincentfretin] (#93)

trans-unit.source: Removed CMFDefault dependency [tomgross]
trans-unit.target: 删除了CMFDefault的依赖关系[tomgross]。

trans-unit.source: Removed ext_editor and visible_ids preferences. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 删除了ext_editor和visible_ids的首选项。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Removing redundant .documentContent markup. This refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10231. [limi]
trans-unit.target: Removing redundant .documentContent markup. This refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10231. [limi]

trans-unit.source: Renamed label_groups to label_add_to_groups in joinform.py [vincentfretin]
trans-unit.target: 在joinform.py中把label_groups改名为label_add_to_groups [vincentfretin]。

trans-unit.source: Rerelease to fix problem on one of our testing servers. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 重新发布以解决我们的一个测试服务器上的问题。[Maurits]

trans-unit.source: Restore the came_from_prefs check to make the join form redirect to the Users and Groups configlet if that’s where the user started from. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Restore the came_from_prefs check to make the join form redirect to the Users and Groups configlet if that’s where the user started from. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Retarget the registration and new-user forms at the navigation root. [mj]
trans-unit.target: 在导航根部重新定位注册和新用户表单。[mj]

trans-unit.source: Retrieve properties as unicode even if they are already stored that way. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10509 [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Retrieve properties as unicode even if they are already stored that way. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10509 [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Setting a member data field to an empty string now works. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/ticket/12314 [maurits]
trans-unit.target: Setting a member data field to an empty string now works. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/ticket/12314 [maurits]

trans-unit.source: Sort groups listing alphabetically by title. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: 按标题按字母顺序排列组别。[esteele]

trans-unit.source: Support
trans-unit.target: 技术支持

trans-unit.source: Support redirecting to a URL specified in the ‘came_from’ query string parameter following registration. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Support redirecting to a URL specified in the ‘came_from’ query string parameter following registration. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: The entire schema can be freely modified, but:
trans-unit.target: 整个模式可以自由修改,但。

trans-unit.source: The user schema can be defined in our GenericSetup profile in a file named
trans-unit.target: 用户模式可以在我们的GenericSetup配置文件中定义,文件名为

trans-unit.source: This file can imported or exported using
trans-unit.target: 该文件可以通过以下方式导入或导出

trans-unit.source: This package provides the registration form and the user profile form. It allows the site administrator to define the fields those forms will display.
trans-unit.target: 这个包提供了注册表格和用户资料表格。它允许网站管理员定义这些表格将显示的字段。

trans-unit.source: Unused field “Listed in searches” removed from Personal Preferences. [kleist]
trans-unit.target: Unused field “Listed in searches” removed from Personal Preferences. [kleist]

trans-unit.source: Update license to GPL version 2 only. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 只更新许可证到GPL 2版本。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Update permission for the @@register view so only users with the
trans-unit.target: 更新 @@register 视图的权限,这样只有用户拥有

trans-unit.source: Update tests. We now check if the user can add and delete the portrait himself. [tschanzt]
trans-unit.target: 更新测试。我们现在检查用户是否可以自己添加和删除肖像。[tschanzt]

trans-unit.source: Updated Site Setup link in all control panels. Fixes https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFPlone/issues/1255 [davilima6]
trans-unit.target: Updated Site Setup link in all control panels. Fixes https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFPlone/issues/1255 [davilima6]

trans-unit.target: Updated account-panel-bare.pt to recent markup conventions. References http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9981 [spliter]

trans-unit.target: Updated memberregistration.pt to recent markup conventions. References http://dev.plone.org/old/plone/ticket/9981 [spliter]

trans-unit.target: Updated register_form.pt to not use fill-slot=”viewlet”. [spliter]

trans-unit.source: Updated tests to reflect current status of the product. [stevem]

trans-unit.target: 使用

trans-unit.source: Use ProtectedEmail for Email field factory [ebrehault]
trans-unit.target: 使用ProtectedEmail作为电子邮件字段工厂[ebrehault]

trans-unit.source: Use correct timezone vocabulary in IPersonalPreferences schema. Wether the newer plone.app.vocabularies, the older plone.app.event one or none at all, depending on availability. [thet]
trans-unit.target: 在IPersonalPreferences模式中使用正确的时区词汇。新的plone.app.vocabularies,旧的plone.app.event,还是没有,取决于是否有。[thet]

trans-unit.source: Use email_from_address from registry (Plone 5) in tests. [khink]
trans-unit.target: 在测试中使用注册表中的email_from_address(Plone 5)。[khink]

trans-unit.source: Use five.formlib. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 使用five.formlib。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Use portal object instead of self.context in AddUserForm so we can easily subclass the class for another context. [vincentfretin]
trans-unit.target: 在AddUserForm中使用portal对象来代替self.context,这样我们就可以很容易地将该类子类用于另一个上下文。[vincentfretin]

trans-unit.source: Use the proper SimpleVocabulary/SimpleTerm API instead of encouraging bad practice. This refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6480. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Use the proper SimpleVocabulary/SimpleTerm API instead of encouraging bad practice. This refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6480. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Use the standard libraries doctest module. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 使用标准库的doctest模块。[hannosch]

trans-unit.target: Use utility-provided UserDataSchema on @@personal-information form. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10258 [khink, huub_bouma]

trans-unit.target: 如果用户添加通知时发生错误,用户反馈。(#86)

trans-unit.source: When the user_registration_fields property is not there, fall back to an empty list; this avoids a TypeError on the registration form. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 当user_registration_fields属性不存在时,退回到一个空列表;这避免了注册表的TypeError。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: utility to get a login name during registration. This makes it easier to override the default login name logic. Part of PLIP 13419. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 工具来获取注册时的登录名。这使得它更容易覆盖默认的登录名逻辑。PLIP 13419的一部分。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: utility to get a user id during registration. This makes it easier to override the default user id logic. Part of PLIP 13419. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 工具来获取注册期间的用户ID。这使得它更容易覆盖默认的用户ID逻辑。PLIP 13419的一部分。[maurits]
